titleStmt.title: Constantinus redivivus, or, A full account of the wonderful providences, and unparallell'd successes that have all along attended the glorious enterprises of the heroical prince, William the 3d, now King of Great Britain, &c. wherein are many curious passages relating to the intrigues of Lewis the 14th, &c. carried on here, and elsewhere, never printed before, &c. / by Mr. John Whittel ...
titleStmt.author: Whittel, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Tho. Harbin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
